channel.title: Paulo Branco on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Paulo Branco on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Paulo Branco Produces ‘Aqui’ Based on J.M. Coetzee’s ‘Jesus’ Trilogy, Starring Manolo Solo and Patricia López Arnaiz (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Veteran Portuguese producer Paulo Branco has begun principal photography on the €4.5 million ($5.3 million) dystopian drama “Aqui,” directed by Tiago Guedes ad shooting in Spain and Portugal. Acclaime
